original: Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: no kilesam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā no kilesam dhamma

original: paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso
analyzed: paṭicca na no kilesaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā no kilesam dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ

original: ca nanokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: ca na nokileso ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nanokilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na no kilesam dhammam paṭicca na no kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nokilesañca nanokilesañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no kilesam ca na no kilesam ca dhammam paṭicca no kilesaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha nava.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha nava
